HeroSection.title: Get a lifetime Internxt plan!
HeroSection.description: Secure all your files and memories forever with a single, one-time payment.

PaymentSection.description: Buy once and get privacy and security forever.

GetLifetimeSection.title: Life is not short! But this limited-time deal is...
GetLifetimeSection.description: Internxt is offering a weeklong deal on a lifetime of privacy and peace of mind.

FeatureSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FeatureSection.description: Privacy made for everyone and simple-to-use online security that you don't have to be an expert to understand. Powerful but familiar, Internxt is encrypted cloud storage built for everyday use in all walks of life.

privacy.title: Private
privacy.description: No first or third-party access to your file ever! You have total control of your data.

fastSync.title: Fast sync
fastSync.description: Encrypt, scramble, fragment, distribute, and transfer, all in the blink of an eye.

security.title: Secure from the core
security.description: Open-source code, end-to-end encrypted, and safely hosted across a vast distributed network.

sharing.title: Safe sharing
sharing.description: Send encrypted files and photos back and forth to your favorite people via link and email.

multiplatform.title: Multiplatform
multiplatform.description: Privacy for all devices, browsers, and operating systems! Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, Android.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: You are the only one with access to your data. Not even Internxt can view your files!

CtaSection.title: Your files secure and private forever
CtaSection.description: We treat our users like family and family is forever!
